inclusion.criterion: Patient is between 1 to 24 months of age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient has reported or measured fever >38.5 degrees C (101.3 degrees F)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: RSV Positive at time of urine collection

exclusion.criterion: Flu Positive at time of urine collection

notes: Patient has severe 2cm bulbar urethral stricture and will require surgical fixation when stable.
